name: On Top of the World
description:
This panorama is the result of five separate photos taken on a perfect day at the top of the Arosa Weisshorn and then stitched together in Photoshop. All five photos were taken on a Pentax K10D.

At over 2,653m above sea level, the Weisshorn is the highest peak in the Arosa region that can be reached by cable car. From where this panorama was taken, there are breathtaking views of more than 400 mountain peaks in Switzerland and neighbouring countries to enjoy. 

Arosa is a town and a municipality in the Plessur Region in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. It is both a summer and a winter tourist resort and has received major boosts in popularity in the past due to famous fans including Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and Erwin Schrödinger.

This is my first Creative Commons 0 Licence NFT. All rights will be released to the world after the NFT is purchased.

I, sodagenjo grant a worldwide CC0 copyright license to download, distribute, and use as wished without any permission needed from the artist or NFT owner. The license takes effect once the NFT has sold and not before.

The full image dimensions are: W - 16100 x H - 2246 at 200 PPI.
